name: Surviving The Night (MikeGaming911)
description:
CONTROLS:

WASD to move

E to pick up items

LEFT CLICK to attack

TAB for inventory

CLICK AND DRAG to sort inventory

CTRL + CLICK AND DRAG to split items in inventory

CRAFTING RECIPES:

wood + wood = spear

cloth + wood = torch

rock + wood = axe

cloth + rock = sword
